::: {.course-overview}
# Course Overview

This course provides a brief introduction to AI tools that work nicely with the other tools in our stack.

As with the other courses, this is a very brief _getting started_ introduction. It will hopefully be enough to get you set up and running.

:::


::: {.course-goals}
# Course Goals

* Know why to use AI tools.
* Be familiar with ways to use AI for data analysis tasks.
* Understand risks and limitations of AI tools.
* Install and set up AI tools within Positron.

:::
